channel.title: Ultraviolet Grasslands: Prismatic Fire on the Horizon
channel.description:
![EbUZVybWAAo-UsX|631x500](upload://bGUOGiS6u6RhaGjI122g3hSFp6n.jpeg) And there followed the Flame Deluge. (…) Cities had become puddles of glass, surrounded by vast acreages of broken stone. – Walter Miller Jr., A Canticle for Leibowitz
[date=2020-09-06 time=18:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] → [date=2020-09-06 time=21:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MDuOFVg_G4-TCJxwfI0 [date=2020-09-13 time=18:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] → [date=2020-09-13 time=21:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MDuOh9EhzHfTmfzKxZL [date=2020-08-23 time=18:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] → [date=2020-08-23 time=21:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MDuP-Ege4cgyk-SKmBi
Ultraviolet Grasslands is a psychedelic metal setting by Luka Rejec about exploration, survival, drugs and resource management. This is a continuation of the adventures of the Cogflower Caravan on her journey to the Black City. New and returning players are equally welcome. We will be using Whitehack, a rules lite version of the world's most popular RPG. This event is scheduled to run for 3.5 hours. It will be recorded assuming all parties agree. There will be 3 sessions in September. Being able to attend each session is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend. This game will follow the Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct: https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html. We will be using [the X-Card](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1SB0jsx34bWHZWbnNIVVuMjhDkrdFGo1_hSC2BWPlI3A/edit) and other safety tools players suggest.

There will be 3 sessions in September. Being able to attend each session is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
